Name: PathCombine
Description: Combines an IEnumerable<string> using Path.Combine(), which will use the separator character that is correct for the platform used. It is a shorter and more correct way to combine paths than just using + "\\" + . Requires "using System.IO;" at the top of your extension method class.
Author: Callum Rogers
Entries:
string path = new[] { s1, s2, s3 }.PathCombine();
string path = someIEnumerableString.PathCombine();
